text: all you need are twenty five minutes and
five ingredients to make two and a half
dozen of these dairy-free
flourless low sugar but most importantly
delicious chocolate chip cookies and the
secret is really in the almond butter it
replaces with the flour and the butter
in these super simple stir together
cookies so let's get going
one cup of almond butter and this is
just a natural almond butter it's just
almonds and a little bit of oil to bring
it together very delicious you could use
peanut butter here you could use cashew
butter any one of those very natural no
sugar added nut butters this is a half a
cup of packed light brown sugar this
will of course add the sweetness and
lots of moisture because there's great
moisture in there two eggs crack these
in 1/4 teaspoon of a coarse salt this
will of course bring out all that
nuttiness and then one cup of semi-sweet
chocolate chip right inside so use a
spatula you kind of have to work it
together this is what we like to call a
dump and stir cookie that's all there is
to it make sure you get all that egg
incorporated into the almond butter okay
that's looking good I have a tablespoon
size ice-cream scoop I like to use an
ice cream scoop for cookies it makes
them very round and very even but you
could just use a tablespoon that would
work as well and then go right on to a
parchment lined baking sheet
these cookies just kind of puff a little
they don't spread very much so you can
get a lot onto one sheet make sure you
got a little bit of chocolate chip in
every scoop all right these are ready to
go they'll go right into a 350 degree
oven until they're puffed and the tops
are set it'll take about ten minutes
these five ingredient gluten-free
cookies are so delicious you'll never
miss the flour and butter and they're
just a little to bite treat give them a
try they're great
you
